channel.title: Hammer documentation
channel.description: Would it be possible for Crowbar to try and put together documentation for how to use the various BM entities in Hammer, such as the OaR tram, garg, osprey, abrams, and apache? It would greatly help prospecting mappers if they want to make use of them. There is some information on the Apache since I asked about it once, on the leak-free threads, but official documentation would help clear up any confusion as to the differences from HL2 coding of the BM-specific entities (i.e. apache vs hunter-chopper).

item.title: Hammer documentation
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
We’d like to do this at some point but are incredibly busy. The best way right now to find out how something works is to look at the vmf of the map that thing comes from; we ship all the vmfs with the game now.

Read full topic

item.title: Hammer documentation
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
IIRC that’s already in the plans.

Read full topic
